item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1598; 10:07PM; 1624 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zWCdIr; Downtown; This **7-story** concrete building was the site of a previous burn. Firefighters ascended the interior stairwells to locate a contents fire on the 7th floor. Firefighters quickly developed "above-ground" hose lines up to the top floor to extinguish the flames in less than 30 minutes, and then ventilated the structure to facilitate smoke removal. No reported injuries. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E15 E17 E2 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1598; 09:37PM; 1624 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zWCdIr; Downtown; PRELIM: Unoccupied 8-story commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E15 E17 E2 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0799; 12:36PM; 200 N Dillon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C2fdu8; #Westlake; One-story home with fire showing. Offensive mode. It took 26 firefighters 20 minutes to extinguish the flames involving a one-story single-family home. No reported injuries.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E211 E220 E6 RA11 RA6 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0582; 09:46AM; 2898 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3STx10G; Griffith Park; LAFD responded by ground and air to a hiker in distress in a remote area near Griffith Park. LAFD Air Operations hoisted and transported one adult female to a local hospital with heat-related illness. Nothing further.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED - Brush Fire; INC#1466; 07:56PM; 6400 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryCvQZ; #LakeBalboa; First arriving 50 ground-based LAFD firefighters, assisted by LAFD helicopter water drops, took just 52 minutes to access, confine and fully contain flames within a 200' x 75' area of grass and heavy brush at the west end of the Sepulveda Basin Recreation Area near Lake Balboa. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. Firefighters will remain at scene this evening to handle hotspots and complete extinguishment. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E109 E239 E273 E287 E288 E83 EM15 H3 H4 H6 HA3 HA4 HA6 RA100 RA90 T39 T73 T87 T88 WT88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1466; 07:04PM; 6400 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryCvQZ; #LakeBalboa; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a grass fire, driven by light wind that extended into heavy brush at the west end of the Sepulveda Basin Recreation Area near Lake Balboa. No infra/structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 E100 E109 E239 E273 E287 E288 E83 EM15 H0B H0F RA100 RA90 T39 T73 T87 T88 WT88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0882; 01:02PM; East Topanga Fire Road; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zUK611; #Topanga State Park; LAFD ground and air response to an exhausted 24 year-old female hiker on the East Topanga Fire Road in a remote area of the Santa Monica Mountains. Weather: Temp 96.1Â°F | Wind 2.2 MPH from SW | Humidity 20% | Sky Clear | Visibility 10 MI | UV6. As ground crews continue their approach and ascent, a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter has lowered a flight paramedic to evaluate, stabilize and commence treatment of the patient, who will soon be hoisted aboard the aircraft for in-flight care during direct helicopter transport to an area hospital.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 E293 E84 H0D RA84 RH114 T93; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Grass Fire; INC#0808; 02:15PM; EB 134 Fwy x Hollywood Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkiedJ; #StudioCity; 20 Firefighters took a little more than two hours to fully extinguish and thoroughly overhaul stubborn flames in a half-acre of mulch, vegetation and debris at and near the 101/134 Freeway interchange. No structure damage. No injury. Lane closures in the immediate area of the fire have been lifted. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E86 E89 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Grass Fire; INC#0808; 12:05PM; EB 134 Fwy x Hollywood Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkiedJ; #StudioCity; PRELIM: Half-acre of mulch, vegetation and debris on fire at and near freeway interchange. No structure threat. No injury. #LATRaffic: One of more lanes of nearby surface streets and freeway lanes may be temporarily closed until LAFD operations are complete. ; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E86 E89 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0353; 07:18AM; 4728 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BYg2Eg; #VermontSquare; *Address Remains Tentative*. 36 firefighters took just 23 minutes to extinguish an outside fire that threatened but was kept to the exterior of a 50' x 50' one story automotive tire shop. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR10 AR7 AR9 BC11 BC13 BC18 E15 E210 E215 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA266 SQ21 T10 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
